author: trondhindenes
body:
# Steps to reproduce

- SSH into a linux machine (I'm running ubuntu 16)
- Install powershell
- Start powershell (pwsh)
- Unload PsReadline (remove-module psreadline)

Copy 10-50 lines of powershell from the host into the session. Witness that each line takes several seconds to paste, and a full script locks the console for several minutes while the paste is "typing"

# Expected behavior
It should be fast

# Actual behavior
It is incredibly slow

# Environment data
```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.1.1
OS                             Linux 4.18.0-13-generic #14-Ubuntu SMP Wed Dec 5 09:04:24 UTC 2018
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```
